question: How long are your degrees
answer:
All our Undergraduate degrees except Health Sciences take a period of 3 years
 Health Sciences degrees take a period of 4 years to complete
 Our Postgraduate degrees take a period of 2 years Part-time for Masters and a period of 1 year for Hons

question: Which degrees do you have in the Faculty of Economics & Management Sciences
answer:
For Undergraduate study level, We have Bachelor of Commerce Accounting sciences, Bachelor of Commerce Entrepreneurship & Business Management, Bachelor of Commerce Economics, Bachelor of Commerce Marketing 
 For Postgraduate study level, We have Bachelor of Commerce(Hons) Accounting Sciences, Bachelor of Commerce(Hons) Marketing, Masters of Commerce Accounting Sciences, Masters of Commerce Marketing
